notes.body: Hello Rekha,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern is regarding the missing medicines from your order #652966587489034240-65045. Kindly note, PharmEasy gives an option to report for the missing medicine within 48 hours from the time of order delivery.      You may check below link for your reference: https://PharmEasy.in/help/medicine-healthcare-orders-43000348761/items-are-missing-from-my-order-43000187662    I have checked that your order was delivered on 1st December 2025. The 48 hours timeline has crossed for reporting the missing medicine. Hence, I am sorry we are unable to comply with your request for the same. I would have surely helped you if you have contacted us within the reporting timeframe. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Rekha,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your concern is regarding the missing medicines from your order #652966587489034240-65045. Kindly note, PharmEasy gives an option to report for the missing medicine within 48 hours from the time of order delivery. 

You may check below link for your reference:
https://PharmEasy.in/help/medicine-healthcare-orders-43000348761/items-are-missing-from-my-order-43000187662

I have checked that your order was delivered on 1st December 2025. The 48 hours timeline has crossed for reporting the missing medicine. Hence, I am sorry we are unable to comply with your request for the same. I would have surely helped you if you have contacted us within the reporting timeframe. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Neeha

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand that you wish to raise a return request for your order #656467657188249600-66867. I understand your query related to the return request for the SHELCAL 500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS.     Please note that the estimated delivery date for this order was 8th December 2025, and the order was delivered to you as scheduled.      I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under a non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.     As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.     For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand that you wish to raise a return request for your order #656467657188249600-66867. I understand your query related to the return request for the SHELCAL 500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS.

Please note that the estimated delivery date for this order was 8th December 2025, and the order was delivered to you as scheduled. 

I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under a non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.

As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.

For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Tahera

notes.body: Hello Ajay,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   I understand you want to raise a return request for the order ID #651559091348381696. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.      As per the system, the pickup is already completed for TUGAIN F PLUS 10% BOTTLE OF 60ML SOLUTION of 1 quantity on 08th December 2025.   Please note that once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 3-5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 5-7 business days.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.   Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

Hi Team,

This is in regards to the Lab Tests done on 8th December, 2025 for
Omprakash Chawla and Sarita Chawla under the registered account with  email
address rashii003@gmail.com and contact details - 8319729476. Order ID:
6231395

I have reviewed the reports but I have few questions.

https://urldefense.com/v3/__http://1.How__;!!PUkdKKdW7rI!bKCYdwj8fS03eZ2MzzvVx7-d5RzWs8G9-qaD8_3Abe5gTNeIsKVAE7Wd24wRC5SZ_c73Nr0oIjGyfNuvvQ$  come it's mentioned that report generated on December 9th 2025 where
as the tests were done on 8th December and I have received the reports on
the same day evening . (screenshot attached for reference)

2. How is this even possible that HbA1c and Average Blood Glucose is exact
same for both reports? Considering the facts that age is different, gender
is different, one is diabetic and the other one isn't.
5.9% (HbA1c) and 123 mg/dL (ABG)

I have attached the screenshots for all of this. Also since we live in
India GMT timezone so Reports generated on 9th Dec doesn't makes any sense
here.

So now you can either get the entire tests redone or you can process the
refund for the tests for both the patients. The entire amount of Rs.5000
because I paid for the tests to be apt not some incorrect reports.

Awaiting your response or else I would be forced to escalate this in a
legal way.

Thanks & Regards
Rashi Chawla

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Error in Lab Test Reports
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi Team,

This is in regards to the Lab Tests done on 8th December, 2025 for Omprakash Chawla and Sarita Chawla under the registered account with  email address rashii003@gmail.com and contact details - 8319729476. Order ID: 6231395

I have reviewed the reports but I have few questions.

1.How come it's mentioned that report generated on December 9th 2025 where as the tests were done on 8th December and I have received the reports on the same day evening . (screenshot attached for reference)

2. How is this even possible that HbA1c and Average Blood Glucose is exact same for both reports? Considering the facts that age is different, gender is different, one is diabetic and the other one isn't.
5.9% (HbA1c) and 123 mg/dL (ABG)

I have attached the screenshots for all of this. Also since we live in India GMT timezone so Reports generated on 9th Dec doesn't makes any sense here. 

So now you can either get the entire tests redone or you can process the refund for the tests for both the patients. The entire amount of Rs.5000 because I paid for the tests to be apt not some incorrect reports. 

Awaiting your response or else I would be forced to escalate this in a legal way.

Thanks & Regards
Rashi Chawla

notes.body: Hello Kuldeep,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  I understand your query related to the return request for FIXDERMA AGE REVERSE 5% HYALURONIC ACID ANTI AGING FACE SERUM - 30ML. I am sorry to inform you that the requested product comes under a non-returnable item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested product or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.  As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.  For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468     Please note that, replacement or exchange facility is unavailable with us.     The product is going to expire in September 2026, so you can use the product safely.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.

notes.body: Hello Samir,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #655570916203823104-20217, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine SYSTANE ULTRA BOTTLE OF 10ML EYE DROPS 1 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     The issue is being investigated, this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will initiate a refund against the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our Partner Retailer.     Please confirm whether the parcel was intact or if any damage was there from the outside at the time of delivery.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Manisha

notes.body: Hello Suman,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Jyoti,     Greetings from PharmEasy !       With referance to below mail.     For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit: Visit the “My Orders” section in your account. Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option. A coupen code will be displayed on the screen. Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation. Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.  Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, Reshma Kokare PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Jyoti,

Greetings from PharmEasy !

With referance to below mail.

For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:
Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.
Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.
A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.
Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.
Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.

Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Reshma Kokare
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Ashok,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #656689454508740608, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine   CARTIGEN FORTE PLUS STRIP OF 10 TABLETS of 1 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Sauvagya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern in regard to the cash on delivery related.     I am sorry I would like to inform you that currently, we are not providing cash on delivery to your area Pincode 751014.     I understand that you are not getting the option to select Cash on Delivery as your preferred choice of payment. The inapplicability of the COD option depends on multiple reasons (types of medicines ordered, delivery location, supplier's location, etc.). For now, the option of Cash on delivery is unavailable on this number. For future orders, if the option is available, it will be visible in the payment modes in the App and Website.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 8071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Tahera

Regards,  Manisha

necessary for us, as it is for mediclaim purpose.

Atleast provide the bills where it is not written "COPY" on the bill.

notes.body: Hello Sanjay,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #656892822270156800-42079, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 09th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.      We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Sanjay,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656892822270156800-42079, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 09th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Ranju,    Greetings from PharmEasy!    A refund of Rs. 142.42 is initiated to your account. helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

I am extremely disappointed with your recent delivery practices. Delivering
products in transparent packaging is a direct breach of customer privacy
and completely unacceptable even after recieve the product they updated
that cancel.

Moreover, the delivery status is being falsely updated as “customer cancel
the order,” while the delivery personnel keep the payment and return random
items to the sender. This is a serious case of misconduct and fraud.

This is the third time this has happened to me, and because of this, I am
forced to order my medicines using different phone numbers each time. This
is highly inconvenient and reflects a serious problem in your service.


I urge you to take immediate action against such practices and ensure that
customer privacy and order integrity are maintained at all times.
Regards
Rudranath Chauhan

Regards

On Thu, Aug 21, 2025 at 8:51 PM Namo Dogra <namo.dogra@aarman.in> wrote:
Hi Grievance Redressal Team,

Please go through the below response and confirm the details before sending it out to the customer:

____________________

Without prejudice, this is with reference to your complaint number [___]. We truly regret the inconvenience you may have experienced and would like to respond to your concerns.

We would like to respectfully reiterate that “PharmEasy” acts as a facilitator for the sale of pharmaceutical products and healthcare services. The Company and the Platform operate solely as intermediaries, connecting the Users and the registered Sellers of the products and services through its mobile application and website.This arrangement, including the limitations of our responsibility, is clearly outlined in our Terms and Conditions, available at https://pharmeasy.in/legal/terms-and-conditions.

Our platform enables you to purchase pharmaceutical products, nutraceuticals, and services offered by third-party retail pharmacies ("Retail Pharmacies"). The products once ordered are duly handed over by the Retail Pharmacies to our third-party logistics partner (“Delivery Partner”). We do not exercise direct control over the function of the Retail Pharmacies and Delivery Partner. PharmEasy’s role is limited to providing hosting services and technological support, facilitating the connection between users and these Retail Pharmacies.

Despite these limitations, we have consistently taken active steps to assist you and resolve your concerns in a timely and fair manner. After your initial grievance, we attempted to coordinate the delivery of your medicines. Further we also processed a full refund of the product amount directly to your source account. Additionally, as a token of goodwill and to ensure customer satisfaction, we have also offered an additional goodwill refund of ₹2,000 (Rupees Two Thousand Only), reflecting our genuine effort to provide you with resolution. This amount is ready to be processed as soon as you share your bank account details for the transfer. We assure you that we remain fully committed to closing this matter respectfully. We have also connected with the relevant stakeholders to ensure that you have a smooth ordering experience in future.

While we understand your concerns, we respectfully submit that PharmEasy's involvement has been limited to its intermediary role. Please consider that we have not dismissed your concerns and have engaged with them constructively offering solutions within the scope of our operational role as an intermediary.

As highlighted in our previous responses, we hold our customers in the highest regard. Hi Team,

I want to inform you that for the last two days, the delivery boy has
attempted to collect the incorrect medicine from the customer's address.
However, the customer is now refusing to return the medicine due to the
repeated delivery of the wrong item. They are demanding a full refund and
compensation.

Please advise on the necessary action regarding this pickup.

Thanks & Regards,
Babu Konampalli

notes.body_html:
Hi Team,

I want to inform you that for the last two days, the delivery boy has attempted to collect the incorrect medicine from the customer's address. However, the customer is now refusing to return the medicine due to the repeated delivery of the wrong item. They are demanding a full refund and compensation.

Please advise on the necessary action regarding this pickup.

Thanks & Regards,
Babu Konampalli 


On Thu, 11 Dec, 2025, 8:49 am Grievance Officer, <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:

@Mahesh Parmar 

Why has this pickup not happened till now?

1. 656531285027880960-50248 -  FL1182576451  

2. Pick up(manual) the items from the previous order 610096008386125824-77916 - FL1170880452, which were not picked up last time, as the customer was not available.

@Chetan Pawar 

As discussed yesterday, you had confirmed that this was again a wrong inward. We need confirmation on the current availability of the correct medicine DIANORM M OD 1000MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS. If not available, this needs to be marked as OOS. 

Also, need an explanation of how this has happened for the third time, even after serious 2 escalations. How will this be prevented in the future?

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk

On Tue, Dec 9, 2025 at 11:31 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Piyasa Roychowdhury 

Cx has replied today as below.

Summary of the issues so far.

1. 594888562692067328-77026
FL1167140104
Order Placed - 20th Jun, 08:03 AM
Delivered - 20th Jun, 05:00 PM
This same issue happened, and the wrong item was delivered. We collected the items manually, and the refund of Rs. 1322.44 was made to the Cx bank account. A new order was placed, and the medicines were delivered free of cost. We had credited Rs. 1322.44 to the PharmEasy wallet to place an order for the same.


2. 610096008386125824-77916
FL1170880452
Order Placed - 1st Aug, 07:12 AM
Delivered - 2nd Aug, 08:11 PM
This same issue happened, and the wrong item was delivered. A refund of Rs.  995.95 was made to the Cx bank account. A new order was placed free of cost. We had credited Rs. 1200 to the PharmEasy wallet to place an order for the same. Attempts were made to deliver the order and to collect the wrong items from Cx, but it failed as the Cx was not available at the address. The free-of-cost order was cancelled, and Rs. 1200 was refunded to the PharmEasy wallet. Cx had later used that amount to place an order.
Additionally, we offered Rs. 2000 as compensation and asked Cx to provide the bank details to proceed, which Cx did not agree to, as he was not ready with that amount.

3. Current latest order #656531285027880960-50248
FL1182446824
Order Placed - 7th Dec, 10:29 AM
Delivered - 8th Dec, 04:17 PM

This same issue has happened again. We have now raised a return request.
Amount paid - Rs. 1788.21

Kindly confirm further actions.







Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk

URGENT: NOTICE OF IMMINENT LEGAL ACTION - COMPLETE FAILURE TO RESOLVE
Without Prejudice
Dear PharmEasy Legal Team,
Your response dated [Date] continues to demonstrate willful negligence and complete disregard for my health and statutory rights. Below is the final accounting of your failures before I initiate legal proceedings:
1. UNFULFILLED COMMITMENTS (AS OF 02-Sep-2025)
  • ❌ NO COMPENSATION for health damages caused by your negligence
  • ❌ NO DELIVERY of correct medicine (Dianorm M OD 1000mg)
  • ❌ NO PICKUP of wrong medicines delivered months ago
  • ❌ NO ACKNOWLEDGMENT of deteriorating health condition
2. HEALTH EMERGENCY DUE TO YOUR NEGLIGENCE
  • Blood sugar levels: Consistently at 475-501 mg/dL (reports attached)
  • New complication: Diabetic wound developed due to uncontrolled sugar
  • Risk assessment: High probability of gangrene/amputation without immediate treatment

Hi Grievance Redressal Team,

Please go through the below response and confirm the details before sending it out to the customer:

____________________

Without prejudice, this is with reference to your complaint number [___]. We truly regret the inconvenience you may have experienced and would like to respond to your concerns.

We would like to respectfully reiterate that “PharmEasy” acts as a facilitator for the sale of pharmaceutical products and healthcare services. The Company and the Platform operate solely as intermediaries, connecting the Users and the registered Sellers of the products and services through its mobile application and website.This arrangement, including the limitations of our responsibility, is clearly outlined in our Terms and Conditions, available at https://pharmeasy.in/legal/terms-and-conditions.

Our platform enables you to purchase pharmaceutical products, nutraceuticals, and services offered by third-party retail pharmacies ("Retail Pharmacies"). The products once ordered are duly handed over by the Retail Pharmacies to our third-party logistics partner (“Delivery Partner”). We do not exercise direct control over the function of the Retail Pharmacies and Delivery Partner. PharmEasy’s role is limited to providing hosting services and technological support, facilitating the connection between users and these Retail Pharmacies.

Despite these limitations, we have consistently taken active steps to assist you and resolve your concerns in a timely and fair manner. After your initial grievance, we attempted to coordinate the delivery of your medicines. Further we also processed a full refund of the product amount directly to your source account. Additionally, as a token of goodwill and to ensure customer satisfaction, we have also offered an additional goodwill refund of ₹2,000 (Rupees Two Thousand Only), reflecting our genuine effort to provide you with resolution. This amount is ready to be processed as soon as you share your bank account details for the transfer. We assure you that we remain fully committed to closing this matter respectfully. We have also connected with the relevant stakeholders to ensure that you have a smooth ordering experience in future.

While we understand your concerns, we respectfully submit that PharmEasy's involvement has been limited to its intermediary role. Please consider that we have not dismissed your concerns and have engaged with them constructively offering solutions within the scope of our operational role as an intermediary.

As highlighted in our previous responses, we hold our customers in the highest regard. In line with this commitment, we once again request you to kindly confirm your preferred bank account details at your convenience so that we may proceed with the pending ₹2,000 (Rupees Two Thousand Only) refund without any further delay. Should you prefer to receive the product ordered by you, we will be glad to initiate the delivery upon your confirmation.

Thank you for your patience so far. We value your association with PharmEasy and remain available to assist you should you have any further concerns.
______________________________________________________________________

Best Regards,
Namo Dogra

Hi Grievance Redressal Team,

Please go through the below response and confirm the details before sending it out to the customer:

____________________

Without prejudice, this is with reference to your complaint number [___]. We truly regret the inconvenience you may have experienced and would like to respond to your concerns.

We would like to respectfully reiterate that “PharmEasy” acts as a facilitator for the sale of pharmaceutical products and healthcare services. The Company and the Platform operate solely as intermediaries, connecting the Users and the registered Sellers of the products and services through its mobile application and website.This arrangement, including the limitations of our responsibility, is clearly outlined in our Terms and Conditions, available at https://pharmeasy.in/legal/terms-and-conditions.

Our platform enables you to purchase pharmaceutical products, nutraceuticals, and services offered by third-party retail pharmacies ("Retail Pharmacies"). The products once ordered are duly handed over by the Retail Pharmacies to our third-party logistics partner (“Delivery Partner”). We do not exercise direct control over the function of the Retail Pharmacies and Delivery Partner. PharmEasy’s role is limited to providing hosting services and technological support, facilitating the connection between users and these Retail Pharmacies.

Despite these limitations, we have consistently taken active steps to assist you and resolve your concerns in a timely and fair manner. After your initial grievance, we attempted to coordinate the delivery of your medicines. Further we also processed a full refund of the product amount directly to your source account. Additionally, as a token of goodwill and to ensure customer satisfaction, we have also offered an additional goodwill refund of ₹2,000 (Rupees Two Thousand Only), reflecting our genuine effort to provide you with resolution. This amount is ready to be processed as soon as you share your bank account details for the transfer. We assure you that we remain fully committed to closing this matter respectfully. We have also connected with the relevant stakeholders to ensure that you have a smooth ordering experience in future.

While we understand your concerns, we respectfully submit that PharmEasy's involvement has been limited to its intermediary role. Please consider that we have not dismissed your concerns and have engaged with them constructively offering solutions within the scope of our operational role as an intermediary.

As highlighted in our previous responses, we hold our customers in the highest regard. In line with this commitment, we once again request you to kindly confirm your preferred bank account details at your convenience so that we may proceed with the pending ₹2,000 (Rupees Two Thousand Only) refund without any further delay. Should you prefer to receive the product ordered by you, we will be glad to initiate the delivery upon your confirmation.

Thank you for your patience so far. We value your association with PharmEasy and remain available to assist you should you have any further concerns.
______________________________________________________________________

Best Regards,
Namo Dogra

With regards to your order #656654872074289152-15919 as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 10th December 2025. notes.body_html:
Hello Sabhagchand,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656654872074289152-15919 as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 10th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Sahas,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   ​Please be informed that at times due to network issues, you may face such technical issues. As a quick fix, I request you to clear your browsing cookies, cache and reinstall your PharmEasy application and connect to a stable network. If you face any difficulty while operating it, please get back to us so that we can check and assist you better.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Sahas,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 
​
​Please be informed that at times due to network issues, you may face such technical issues. As a quick fix, I request you to clear your browsing cookies, cache and reinstall your PharmEasy application and connect to a stable network. If you face any difficulty while operating it, please get back to us so that we can check and assist you better.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. notes.body_html:
Hello Shailendra,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656917498195255296-15493.We tried to call you regarding the concern raised however we are unable to establish contact with you. 
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

notes.body_html:
Hello Neha,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regard to order #650807501640228864-72244. We tried calling you, however, we were unable to connect with you. As per the update received, we have arranged a collection to pick up the below item.
 
GRITZO SUPERMILK HEIGHT+ DRINK MIX FOR BOYS (13+ YRS) | 400G | CREAMY VANILLA  – Quantity - 1
 
Please return only the items for which the request is raised. Item(s) that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact. 
 
Please contact us once the items are picked up so that we can process the refund to the PharmEasy wallet. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. 
 
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   I tried to reach you earlier today at 02:49 PM on 7001533234, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.  ​   I understand your query related to the return request for DR. MOREPEN GLUCO ONE BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST STRIP | BG-03 | 50 NO'S. I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.   As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.  ​ For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 
​
I tried to reach you earlier today at 02:49 PM on 7001533234, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.
​
I understand your query related to the return request for DR. MOREPEN GLUCO ONE BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST STRIP | BG-03 | 50 NO'S. I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.

As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.
​
For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body_html:
Hello Annu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656595766655352832-70083, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 09th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Ria,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regards to your order #652873579383750656-94044, I understand your concern in regard to the refund amount.      The refund amount of Rs.888.74 was initiated on 27th November 2025, and the refund has been credited to your payment source. Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the Refund Reference number (533100513294).     If you have not received the refund amount, kindly share the bank statement from 27th November 2025 till the date so that we can check and assist you.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Ria,

notes.body: Hello Asoke Kumar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #576995998821761024-25552, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.      We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Asoke Kumar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #576995998821761024-25552, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy
